item.title: Negroni Sbagliato
item.description: 1½ oz Campari1½ oz sweet vermouth1½ oz sparkling wineorange peel spiral Stir together the Campari and sweet vermouth with ice. Strain into a champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine. Garnish with a thin orange spiral.

item.title: Little Bit Bittah
item.description: 2 oz vodka½ oz Campari1½ oz grapefruit juice½ oz grenadinegrapefruit wedge Shake vodka, Campari, grapefruit juice, and grenadine. Strain into rocks glass over ice. Garnish with grapefruit wedge.
